page.title: 06A farm boy's day - Heathylee
page.content:
On the farm there is a lot of work to be done.
I get up at 6.30a.m. to do the milking. We have our breakfast. After breakfast I set in to do some more hard work. I have to scrape the sheds out and then spread the muck. By that time it is dinner time.
Then I do some siloing which takes the time up to about 5 o'clock and then I have to do the milking and then I suckle the calves.
By this time it is 7 o'clock and I have my tea and watch television and then I think, "Thank goodness for that" and I go to bed.
